Subaru Impreza WRX 0-60 times

Autotk.com offers accurate information on Subaru Impreza WRX 0-60 times and quarter mile from trusted sources. You may also keep track of how 0-60 times of Subaru Impreza WRX changed across years and check out the model’s competitors with the same acceleration performance.

Our mission is to present an easy-to-read and comprehensive information on Subaru Impreza WRX 0-60 mph and quarter mile for the devoted geeks, as it is an essential indicator of the vehicle power.

    • 0-60 3.4 - 5.4 sec

It might be difficult to reproduce official Subaru Impreza WRX 0-60 times driving your own car, as measuring accuracy of Subaru Impreza WRX acceleration from 0 to 60 depends on the transmission type or such variables as wind, weather conditions, tire traction or even weight of the rim. For the safety of the public, 0-60 times are often recorded by professional drivers on the closed racing tracks or dragstrips.

The good news is you can always soup up your car to have the best drag times. The easiest way is chip-tuning. The Engine of Subaru Impreza WRX is equipped with an engine management system (EMS)/Engine Control Unit (ECU) which can be modified to different settings, producing different performance levels and boosting Impreza WRX\'s horsepower.

Right now we are well on course to post the data on transmission and engine on the Subaru Impreza WRX acceleration page of our website. We also have plans to make it possible for any visitor of the website to add their own custom data on Subaru Impreza WRX acceleration.
